description: Successful adverse possession claim - all elements met
facts: Alice has occupied the vacant lot for 25 years
Her use has been continuous without interruption
She openly maintains a garden visible to all
The true owner never gave permission
She has paid property taxes for 20 years
The statutory period in this jurisdiction is 20 years
asp_facts: claim(c1). claimant(c1, alice). property_type(c1, land). occupation_years(c1, 25). occupation_continuous(c1, yes). occupation_open(c1, yes). occupation_hostile(c1, yes). taxes_paid(c1, yes). statutory_period(c1, 20).
question: Has Alice acquired title through adverse possession?
rationale: Adverse possession requires continuous, open, notorious, and hostile possession for the statutory period. Alice has occupied for 25 years (exceeds 20-year requirement), continuously, openly, without permission, and paid taxes.
